SELECT t.task_name FROM biz_tape_inventory_task t LEFT JOIN biz_tape_inventory_subtask st ON st.task_id = t.id WHERE t.location_id LIKE CONCAT(#{firstLocationId}, '%') AND #{locationId} LIKE CONCAT(t.location_id, '%' )
AND ( t.library_ids IS NULL OR JSON_LENGTH(t.library_ids) = 0 OR JSON_OVERLAPS( t.library_ids, #{arrayRackIds}))
AND t.id != #{filterTaskId} AND t.process_status = 2 AND st.status = 0 GROUP BY t.id LIMIT 1
